name: Distro Horizons - 3D Collectathon Project (Canceled)
blurb: Distro Horizons VS Galaximo's Army is a 3D Collectathon project for Windows, Mac, Linux, Ouya and Wii U!

rewards.reward: A Thank-You Shout-Out & Your name on the Kitatus Studios Website & Facebook page!

THE THANKS TIER - Access to behind-the-scenes of development of the game as the game is being developed! Exclusive Videos, Write-Ups and Polls that will shape the final product! + Lossless Download of the FULL track "Winter Wonders", the background song for the demo! + Previous Reward

[EARLY BIRD OFFER] THE OWNER TIER - The game upon completion! You get a digital DRM-free (PC/Linux/Mac/Ouya) copy of the game upon release - PLUS a Steam Code if the project makes it to Steam (Or any other digital release platforms) - Cheaper than the \u00a38 tier! + All Previous Rewards

THE OWNER TIER - You get a digital DRM-free (PC/Linux/Mac/Ouya/Wii U) copy of the game upon release - PLUS a Steam Code if the project makes it to Steam (Or any other digital release platforms)  + All Previous Rewards

THE MULTI-OWNER TIER - Have a DRM-FREE copy of the game for PC, Mac AND Linux upon completion of the project! You'll also be given access to the Ouya version too! Only want the one? Feel free to pass the extra copies to friends or family members! + All Previous Reward Tiers

THE AUDIOPHILE TIER - Grab an exclusive lossless digital download of the Soundtrack behind Distro Horizons VS Galaximo's Army. You'll have extra tracks that won't be available anywhere else! + A Thank-You in the Credits + All Previous Reward Tiers

THE ALPHA 'N BETA TIER - All the Builds! Every time we have a private release? You're going to be able to download it! Test out portions of the game before anyone else and get a true inside look at the game as you watch it form before your very eyes. + All Previous Reward Tiers

THE DIGITAL ARTBOOK TIER - Own yourself a piece of virtual Kitatus history and net yourself all the documents (Not just sketches, but ALL the doodles, charts and design processes) behind the project, perfect for game making enthusiasts or just fans of Distro Horizons! How did a doodle on a piece of paper with "CATBUG" written on it become Distro Horizons? This is your only way to find out! + All Previous Reward Tiers
THE POSTER 'N VOTER TIER - Exclusive Kickstarter Poster + Get your say in key design choices for the project! + All Previous Rewards

THE SHIRT & CD TIER - Grab yourself a shirt and a limited edition soundtrack CD to hold in your hands, EXCLUSIVE to this Kickstarter campaign! This CD & Shirt combination will not be available anywhere after the campaign so get them while they're hot! + \u00a31 - \u00a320 Reward Tiers

THE BOOK TIER - Your own signed trade paperback "Making Of" book. Your name will be imprinted not only into the games credits, but also into the books acknowledgements too!  + \u00a31 - \u00a320 Reward Tiers

THE BOXED TIER - Boxed copy! A boxed, physical version of the project upon completion; Goodies are hidden inside the box which are exclusive to this Kickstarter limited edition! +  \u00a31 - \u00a320 Reward Tiers

IN THE GAME TIER - Become a non-playable character the one of the worlds of Distro Horizons! We'll send you images / screenshots and details on how to find your creation too! + Exclusive Kickstarter Shirt! +  \u00a31 - \u00a320 Reward Tiers
THE ACTION FIGURE TIER - Own your own Distro Horizon in your hands! The action figures are exclusive to this Kickstarter campaign so get them while they're hot! + \u00a31 - \u00a320 Reward Tiers

THE BOSS TIER - Become a boss character in Distro Horizons. This means you will play a part in the story of the project and every player will see your design and hear your voice (If applicable)! The boss characters are key to the story and the whole universe behind Distro Horizons so this is not an oppertunity to be missed! + Exclusive Kickstarter Shirt! +  \u00a31 - \u00a320 Reward Tiers

THE FUTURE TIER - Become a main character in the future project! We'll talk with you and together, we'll create a character in a future Kitatus Studios project! Using your designs, names and with a little bit of our input to bring it to life, your character will star in it's own video-game! + Exclusive Kickstarter T-Shirt + \u00a31 - \u00a320 Reward Tiers

THE EXECUTIVE TIER - Want to be credited as an Executive Producer? Now its your chance! Thanks to you, the project will arrive in no-time and so we believe the only way we can exclaim our gratitude for this feat would be to credit you as the official Executive Producer behind Distro Horizons vs Galaximo's Army! + \u00a31 - \u00a320 Reward Tiers
